title: Implement claims index with rebuild capability
description:
Implement `claims.index.json` derived view with active leases. Support rebuild from JSONL log. Include schema version, generated_at timestamp, sequence number, and stale_threshold_secs.

## Lease Entry Schema
- `lease_id`, `issue_id`, `agent_id`, `worktree_id`, `branch`
- `ttl_secs`: 0 for indefinite, >0 for finite
- `expires_at`: RFC3339 timestamp or null (for TTL=0)
- `last_beat`: RFC3339 timestamp (for staleness checks)
- `stale`: boolean (derived: true if TTL=0 and now - last_beat > threshold)

See design doc section "Claims Index JSON".
